response.original_title: Post Malone - Live at The Town
response.overview: Recorded on September 2, 2023, at the Autódromo de Interlagos in São Paulo, Brazil, this appearance marked Post Malone’s headline slot on the Skyline stage during the inaugural The Town Festival. The roughly 80-minute performance featured a core setlist drawn from his 2023 Austin album, as well as earlier hits. Standout songs included “Better Now,” “Wow.,” “Zack and Codeine,” “Psycho,” “Rockstar,” and “Circles.” The evening concluded with an encore that featured “Sunflower” and “Chemical,” reflecting the format of his If Y'all Weren’t Here, I'd Be Crying Tour. Setlist.fm confirms he performed 22 tracks plus a three-song encore.  Filmed and later shared online, the full concert is available on YouTube. This set highlights Post Malone’s consistent blend of hip-hop and melodic balladry, showcasing his crossover appeal at a major Brazilian festival.
response.title: Post Malone - Live at The Town
